Laurent Duperval wrote:

> On 19 Oct, Mike Clark wrote:
> > Perhaps a look at the TransactionTestCase.setUp() would help, as this
> > seems to be the differentiator.
> >

The UserTransaction is enlisting all the EJB resources, but I suspect that the
transaction isolation levels are causing the finder to only read committed
data, and the call to setDefault(true) isn't being committed.

Mike
